General.Name: Lucky Minerals Inc
General.Description: Lucky Minerals Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties. The company explores for gold, copper, and molybdenum deposits. It holds a 100% interest in the Fortuna project comprises 12 contiguous mining concessions covering approximately 55,000 hectares in a prolific mineralized zone in southern Ecuador. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
